  • Classes in org.elasticsearch.common.util.concurrent used by org.elasticsearch.action.search.type 
    Class and Description
    AtomicArray
    A list backed by an AtomicReferenceArray with potential null values, easily allowing to get the concrete values as a list using AtomicArray.asList().
    AtomicArray.Entry
    An entry within the array.
  • Classes in org.elasticsearch.common.util.concurrent used by org.elasticsearch.action.support 
    Class and Description
    BaseFuture
    An abstract implementation of the ListenableFuture interface.
  • Classes in org.elasticsearch.common.util.concurrent used by org.elasticsearch.common.util.concurrent 
    Class and Description
    AtomicArray.Entry
    An entry within the array.
    ConcurrentMapLong 
    EsThreadPoolExecutor
    An extension to thread pool executor, allowing (in the future) to add specific additional stats to it.
    EsThreadPoolExecutor.ShutdownListener 
    KeyedLock
    This class manages locks.
    PrioritizedCallable 
    PrioritizedEsThreadPoolExecutor
    A prioritizing executor which uses a priority queue as a work queue.
    PrioritizedEsThreadPoolExecutor.Pending 
    PrioritizedRunnable 
    XRejectedExecutionHandler 
  • Classes in org.elasticsearch.common.util.concurrent used by org.elasticsearch.river.routing 
    Class and Description
    CountDown
    A simple thread safe count-down class that in contrast to a CountDownLatch never blocks.
